to yarddawg 
Best client is utorrent, although you might want to tweak the settings a bit, if you have a very fast internet connection (such as increasing the number of connections it can make per second and the increasing the size it will write each time; e.g. 10kb means that after 10kb is downloaded it will write the 10kb away, with 10mb it writes the 10mb after the 10mb has been downloaded). The writing size story reduces the strain on your harddisk.

For more info on the advanced settings see the utorrent site and download the help
